product_details.name: GIVA 925 Sterling Silver Rose Gold Pink Drop Wreath Studs | Gift for Girlfriend Wife Women & Girls | With Certificate of Authenticity and 925 Stamp | 6 Month Warranty*
product_details.description: Product Dimensions: 1.27 x 1.3 x 1.27 cm; 3.9 g. Item part number: ER0583. Country of Origin: India. Department: womens. Item Weight: 3.9 g. Item Dimensions Lx Wx H: 13 x 13 x 13 Millimeters. Net Quantity: 2.00 count. Generic Name: Stud Earrings. Customer Reviews: 4.5 4.5 out of 5 stars 65 ratings.

banner_details:
This elegant banner presents a premium jewelry product with a modern, feminine design. The composition features a diagonal two-tone pink gradient background, enhanced with translucent star bursts and circular shapes for subtle visual interest. The main focal point is the product image ("product_image")—a pair of rose gold earrings—displayed prominently to the right.

Text hierarchy is clearly structured, starting with the bold header ("heading") that highlights the product name, followed by a subheading ("subheading") and detailed feature list ("description"). The price ("price") is prominently showcased below, and a noticeable call-to-action button ("cta_button") with readable text ("cta") encourages immediate engagement.

**Color Palette:**
- Rose Pink: `#F8DAE2`
- Soft Peach: `#FFE2E0`
- Deep Rose: `#96344F`
- Plum: `#6D2941`
- Accent Pink: `#E0979E`
- Button Text White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image features a delicate pair of earrings showcasing a balanced blend of soft rose gold and sparkling white elements. The rose gold (#F4A6A6) forms the base structure, adding warmth and elegance, while the sparkling stones—featuring shades of crystal white (#FFFFFF) and icy silver (#E1E1E1)—create a striking contrast, drawing attention to the intricate design. The pink enamel teardrop element (#F7C1C2) adds a feminine touch and blends smoothly into the rose gold frame. The interplay of gloss and matte finishes enhances depth and luxury. For an advertisement banner, a palette including soft pink (#F7C1C2), rose gold (#F4A6A6), crystal white (#FFFFFF), and silver (#E1E1E1) would create a cohesive and elegant feel.
